text: Yesu nkuvayang'ula kuchidoni, “Ing'anya ing'ulupa yenu inyoko. Nangu nìnnyaulilanga uhiu kuva, mukàva na ing'ulupa inyoko malinga imbeyu ya haladali, muchimuhulule kulihaulila lichinga alino, ‘Uka apano uhwene apala,’ na linang'o lichiliuke.
